text: Styx Records is an Austrian record label. It was founded in 1999 by the former drummer of the Mojo Blues Band, Peter Müller. The label focuses on blues, rhythm&blues; and boogie woogie from Austria. ==Artists== * Mojo Blues Band; * Frank Muschalle Trio; * Vince Weber; * Martin Pyrker; * Andreas Sobczyk; * Siggi Fassl; * Norbert Schneider’s R&B; Caravan; * Henning Pertiet Trio; == Other websites == * Styx Records Homepage with samples from the labels records Category:Blues labels Category:Record labels Category:Independent record labels
title: Styx Records
